content: --पातः {1} siding with any one. {2} liking, desire, love, affection (for a thing), भवंति भव्येषु हि पक्षपाताः <ls>Ki. 3. 12</ls>, <ls>Ve. 3. 10</ls>; <ls>U. 5. 17</ls>; रिपुपक्षे बद्धः पक्षपातः <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {3} attachment to a party, partisanship, partiality; पक्षपातमत्र देवी मन्यते <ls>M. 1</ls>; सत्यं जना वच्मि न पक्षपातात् <ls>Bh. 1. 47.</ls> {4} falling of wings, the moulting of birds. {5} a partisan.
